channel.title: LUKS Nuke
channel.description:
I accidentally came across some interesting feature in Kali Linux 1.0.6+ today and I would like to share that information with the Whonix community. Kali developers basically patched cryptsetup to include a "nuke" password. They released the code on Github. I'm providing a link to the respective blog post + the Github repository.
http://www.kali.org/how-to/nuke-kali-linux-luks/ https://github.com/offensive-security/cryptsetup-nuke-keys
